common.consultSupport: Consult lastgram support at @lastgramsupport for more information.
common.checkFmStatus: For more information, check @lastfmstatus at Twitter or @lastgramsupport at Telegram.
common.checkSpelling: Please check your spelling and try again.

targetable.userMentionedNotRegistered: The user you mentioned has not registered themselves yet. $t(errors:common.useRegister)
targetable.userMentionedBanned: Sorry, the user you mentioned has been banned from using this bot. $t(errors:common.consultSupport)

registered.userNotRegistered: This command is only available to registered users. $t(errors:common.useRegister)
registered.userBanned: Sorry, you have been banned from using this bot. $t(errors:common.consultSupport)

guards.onlyDMs: Sorry, this command can only be used in private messages.

command.missingArgument:
Missing arguments.
This command should be used like this: `{{- usage}}`
command.generic: Sorry, an unknown error occurred while processing your command. $t(errors:common.consultSupport)
command.invalidArgument:
Invalid argument.
This command should be used like this: `{{- usage}}`

lastfm.genericError: Sorry, an unknown error occurred with last.fm. $t(errors:common.tryAgain)
lastfm.serviceUnavailable: Sorry, last.fm seems to be currently unavailable. $t(errors:common.checkFmStatus)
lastfm.seriousError: Sorry, a serious error occurred with last.fm. $t(errors:common.consultSupport)
lastfm.userNotFound: Sorry, the last.fm username you specified was not found. $t(errors:common.checkSpelling)
lastfm.noScrobbles: Sorry, the last.fm user you specified has not scrobbled anything yet.
